Text: Anyone know where to get english subtitles, cant find them anywhere

well i watched it without subtitles they don't say much anyways. i'm angry at you BOZX, not that you care, but thx anyways.

Personally, I think it's better to wait for a subtitled version before uploading, but it's pretty ridiculous to be "angry" at someone who's giving you quality shit for free, especially since he never claimed that there were subtitles in the first place.
if someone can translate I can sub

frmanolo, I dont mean to be rude.  I translated those subs (google translate worked perfect) and they are 10%.  I guess whats why Its titled "Rough"  Just so you guys know, those subs above, those subs are only 70 long. A normal foreign film (like untouchables) was 1600 lines of words.  We need a better one. :(
